PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : list (output of gr_menu), or vector of length four [xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax] (boundaries of the plot).
: integers with 0, 1 value. Use flag=1 for non interactive mode (i.e to redraw saved gr_menu graphics) and no_frame=1 to avoid a frame around gr_menu graphics.

DESCRIPTION.P: gr_menu is a simple interactive graphic editor. When you execute gr_menu(), three new menus, Objects, Settings and Edit are added to the current graphics window. Use the item Exit of menu Edit to exit gr_menu.
The created graphics are saved as a list which can be given to gr_menu as an entry value.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: [sd]=gr_menu([xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax])
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : enters gr_menu with a given frame

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: [sd]=gr_menu(sd)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : redraws the graphics stored in sd and enters interactive mode

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: [sd]=gr_menu(sd,1)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : only draws the graphics stored in sd.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: [sd]=gr_menu(sd,1,1)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : only draws the graphics stored in sd and no frame is added.
